headline: Uber Technologies (NYSE:UBER) Unveils Robot Delivery Expansion And Autonomous Ventures In Dubai
summary: Uber Technologies (NYSE:UBER) saw a 21% increase in its share price over the last quarter, supported by several strategic partnerships and expansions. The recent collaboration with Coco Robotics, launching in Miami, and the joint initiative with WeRide to enhance autonomous vehicle access in Dubai suggests UBER's commitment to innovation and market expansion. These developments were likely favorably viewed by investors amid a generally positive tech stock environment, as reflected by gains in...

headline: Domino’s Pizza and DoorDash Strike a Deal. Sales Are Why.
summary: Domino’s Pizza  will add the  DoorDash  app for delivery orders nationwide starting in May and plans to expand the service to Canada later this year, the company said on Wednesday.  DoorDash orders will be delivered by Domino’s drivers, the company said.  Domino’s didn’t specify which cities are in the program, but has about 7,000 locations in the U.S. The company also uses the  Uber Eats  app.

Domino’s didn’t specify which cities are in the program, but has about 7,000 locations in the U.S. The company also uses the  Uber Eats  app.

headline: DoorDash Stock Jumps on Domino's Pizza Partnership
summary: DoorDash shares surged Wednesday after the delivery platform announced a new partnership with Domino's Pizza.

headline: Coco Robotics Expands Uber Eats Partnership to Miami
summary: Coco Robotics, the world's leading food delivery robotics company, announced today that it's launching operations in Miami, starting with delivery partner Uber Eats (NYSE: UBER). This announcement marks Coco's entry into the Southeast market.

raw.headline: Coco Robotics Expands Uber Eats Partnership to Miami

headline: Uber Teams Up With WeRide To Bring Self-Driving Cars To Dubai
summary: Uber Technologies, Inc (NYSE:UBER) and WeRide, Inc (NASDAQ:WRD) announced a partnership with Dubai’s Road and Transport Authority (RTA). The partnership aims to help Uber make autonomous vehicles an accessible and reliable part of everyday life in Dubai, beginning with WeRide as the first technology partner. headline: Best Stock to Buy Right Now: Uber vs. Lyft?
summary: When it comes to ride-sharing in the U.S., there are only two choices for consumers and investors: Uber (NYSE: UBER) and Lyft (NASDAQ: LYFT).  The two companies have been rivals since their early days, and while Uber has long been the market leader, Lyft has been a steady innovator in the space and held its own despite predictions that it would fall by the wayside.  There are two primary differences between Uber and Lyft.

headline: Domino's partners with DoorDash in US stores to lure customers
summary: A new partnership between Domino's and DoorDash means that uniformed Domino's drivers will deliver pizzas ordered through the DoorDash app, the pizza company said Wednesday.  Being listed on the DoorDash app means it will be easier for Domino's to reach new customers accustomed to ordering through the DoorDash app, and Chief Executive Officer Joe Jordan said in a prepared statement the company expects to gain new customers particularly in rural and suburban areas.  Jordan said third-party delivery platforms are a "$1 billion opportunity" for the pizza company.

headline: Domino’s teams with DoorDash, ditches Uber Eats exclusivity
summary: The pizza chain, which has partnered with Uber Eats since 2023, believes third-party aggregator partnerships are a $1 billion sales opportunity.

summary: Executives said drones and autonomous vehicles are helping their companies speed up need-it-now delivery trips during Grocery Dive’s virtual event.

headline: Uber and WeRide Partner with Dubai’s Road and Transport Authority to Bring Autonomous Vehicles to Dubai
summary: DUBAI, United Arab Emirates, April 02, 2025--Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: UBER) and WeRide (NASDAQ: WRD) have taken another step toward shaping the future of mobility, announcing today a partnership with Dubai’s Road and Transport Authority (RTA). The partnership paves the way for Uber to make AVs an accessible and reliable part of everyday life in Dubai, beginning with WeRide as the first technology partner.
